name: Helix (itch) (StyrofoamBoots)
description:
Use W/Up Arrow to Dash and A/D or Left/Right Arrow to Jump.

Avoid red walls, if you hit five you lose. Hitting an orange and a blue cube fills your meter and restores a life.

The squiggly line at the bottom shows how many dashes and jumps you have left. They are restored after you pass through the middle line again

Enjoy!
